text: xallxh khux phuthrng srang phwk cea læw thrng hı paccay yangchiph kæ phwk cea læw thrng hı phwk cea tay læw thrng hı phwk cea pen ca mi phu dı bang nı hmu phakhi khxng phwk cea kratha sak xyang hnung cak sing hela nan mha brisuththi dæ phraxngkh læa phraxngkh thrng sungsng cak sing thi phwk khea tang phakhi
